00055 class LIBCONFIGXX_API SettingException : public ConfigException
00056 {
00057   friend class Config;
00058 
00059   public:
00060 
00061   SettingException(const SettingException &other);
00062   SettingException& operator=(const SettingException &other);
00063 
00064   virtual ~SettingException() throw();
00065 
00066   const char *getPath() const;
00067 
00068   virtual const char *what() const throw();
00069 
00070   protected:
00071 
00072   SettingException(const Setting &setting);
00073   SettingException(const Setting &setting, int idx);
00074   SettingException(const Setting &setting, const char *name);
00075   SettingException(const char *path);
00076 
00077   private:
00078 
00079   char *_path;
00080 };

00149   { return(_line); }

00165 class LIBCONFIGXX_API Setting
00166 {
00167   friend class Config;
00168 
00169   public:
00170 
00171   enum Type
00172   {
00173     TypeNone = 0,
00174     // scalar types
00175     TypeInt,
00176     TypeInt64,
00177     TypeFloat,
00178     TypeString,
00179     TypeBoolean,
00180     // aggregate types
00181     TypeGroup,
00182     TypeArray,
00183     TypeList
00184   };
00185 
00186   enum Format
00187   {
00188     FormatDefault = 0,
00189     FormatHex = 1
00190   };
00191 
00192   private:
00193 
00194   config_setting_t *_setting;
00195   Type _type;
00196   Format _format;
00197 
00198   Setting(config_setting_t *setting);
00199 
00200   void assertType(Type type) const
00201     throw(SettingTypeException);
00202   static Setting & wrapSetting(config_setting_t *setting);
00203 
00204   Setting(const Setting& other); // not supported
00205   Setting& operator=(const Setting& other); // not supported
00206 
00207   public:
00208 
00209   virtual ~Setting() throw();
00210 
00211   inline Type getType() const throw() { return(_type); }
00212 
00213   inline Format getFormat() const throw() { return(_format); }
00214   void setFormat(Format format) throw();
00215 
00216   operator bool() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00217   operator int() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00218   operator unsigned int() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00219   operator long() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00220   operator unsigned long() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00221   operator long long() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00222   operator unsigned long long() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00223   operator double() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00224   operator float() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00225   operator const char *() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00226   operator std::string() const throw(SettingTypeException);
00227 
00228   inline const char *c_str() const throw(SettingTypeException)
00229   { return operator const char*(); }
00230 
00231   Setting & operator=(bool value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00232   Setting & operator=(int value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00233   Setting & operator=(long value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00234   Setting & operator=(const long long &value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00235   Setting & operator=(const double &value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00236   Setting & operator=(float value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00237   Setting & operator=(const char *value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00238   Setting & operator=(const std::string &value) throw(SettingTypeException);
00239

00241     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException);
00242 
00243   inline Setting & operator[](const std::string &key) const
00244     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException)
00245   { return(operator[](key.c_str())); }

00248     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException);

00282     throw()
00283   { return(lookupValue(name.c_str(), value)); }

00286     throw()
00287   { return(lookupValue(name.c_str(), value)); }

00298     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException);

00301     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException)
00302   { remove(name.c_str()); }

00305     throw(SettingTypeException, SettingNotFoundException);

00308     throw(SettingNameException, SettingTypeException)

00312     throw(SettingNameException, SettingTypeException);
00313

00317   { return(exists(name.c_str())); }
00318 
00319   bool exists(const char *name) const throw();
00320 
00321   int getLength() const throw();

00324   int getIndex() const throw();
00325 
00326   const Setting & getParent() const throw(SettingNotFoundException);
00327   Setting & getParent() throw(SettingNotFoundException);
00328 
00329   bool isRoot() const throw();
00330 
00331   inline bool isGroup() const throw()
00332   { return(_type == TypeGroup); }
00333 
00334   inline bool isArray() const throw()
00335   { return(_type == TypeArray); }
00336 
00337   inline bool isList() const throw()
00338   { return(_type == TypeList); }
00339 
00340   inline bool isAggregate() const throw()
00341   { return(_type >= TypeGroup); }
00342 
00343   inline bool isScalar() const throw()
00344   { return((_type > TypeNone) && (_type < TypeGroup)); }
00345 
00346   inline bool isNumber() const throw()
00347   { return((_type == TypeInt) || (_type == TypeInt64)
00348            || (_type == TypeFloat)); }
00349 
00350   unsigned int getSourceLine() const throw();
00351   const char *getSourceFile() const throw();
00352 };

00387   { return(readString(str.c_str())); }
